name: bastille
content:

a military building in Paris that was used as a prison in the 17th and 18th centuries. In 1789 it was attacked by people who wanted revolution (= violent social and political change) in France, and this attack is regarded as being the start of the French Revolution: On 14th July the French celebrate the storming of the Bastille.
